bs-namespacemanager-desc: Administration interface for adding, editing and deleting namespaces
bs-namespacemanager-ns-length: The namespace must have a minimum length of two characters.
bs-namespacemanager-msgnoteditabledelete: This namespace is a system namespace and cannot be deleted.
bs-namespacemanager-willmovesuffix: Will be moved into "{{int:bs-ns_main}}" with the suffix "$1"
bs-namespacemanager-deletewarning: Are you sure that you want to delete this namespace? Deleting a namespace cannot be undone.
bs-namespacemanager-deletens-movepages: This page has been moved from namespace "$1" to namespace "{{int:bs-ns_main}}", because namespace "$1" was deleted.
bs-namespacemanager-deletens-deletepages: This page has been deleted, because namespace "$1" was deleted.
